segments.text: Yes , actually . I don't really know anyone , but it's a nice place . Are you having a good time ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Yes . The drinks are very good ! I'm Paul , by the way .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Hello Paul . I'm Jane . So what do you do ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Really ? Me , too . I work for an accountancy company , T & D . Maybe you've heard of them .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: T & D ? Oh , yes , sure . How long have you worked there ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: About two years . And you ? Are you based here ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: No . Actually , I'm based in Shanghai . I'm just here for the conference . So , T & D eh ...
segments.speaker: S1
